overview: John Leslie is a man with a quest. He's in search of an extraordinary, multi-talented female who - in addition to performing in the bedroom - can also wield a spray bottle and rag. On his trek through the tightest, tastiest T&A in town (namely cupcake Candie Evans, fiery Krista Lane, and Brazilian bombshell Elle Rio), John woefully discovers that everyone wants to do him but no one wants to do his windows. Will this exhausted explorer find that one sexpot in a million who fears not from a pane of glass? Find out in master-director Anthony Spinelli's latest erotic gem.
tagline: She Got Down On Her Knees - And It Wasn't To Wax The Linoleum!
title: And I Do Windows... Too!
